sentences.en: " I'd be glad to,'said Carrie, " but I have a rehearsal this morning. "
sentences.cn: “ 我很高兴去, "嘉莉说, " 但是今天上午我要排练. ”
排练结束后,嘉莉把这事告诉了萝拉.

sentences.en: Carrie related the incidents of the rehearsal , warming up as she proceeded.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉把排戏中发生的事一五一十地告诉他, 说着说着情绪高涨起来.

sentences.en: He listened attentively to my brief rehearsal of the structure of parts.
sentences.cn: 他专心地听着我描述各部分的结构.

sentences.en: He was invited to sit in on a rehearsal.
It was the scene which had pleased the director at the rehearsal.
sentences.cn: 这场戏在排演时曾大得导演的赏识.

sentences.en: It's the girls having their rehearsal.
It'seemed like a rehearsal of her own life, terrible in its vividness.
sentences.cn: 它就象是她自己一生的一次排演, 生动逼真得可怕.
《罗密欧与朱丽叶》的几次排练

sentences.en: The play is in rehearsal now.
The rehearsal process also irked him increasingly.
sentences.cn: 排练过程也让他越来越厌烦。

sentences.en: The rehearsal studio is buzzing with lunchtime activity.
sentences.cn: 大家在吃午饭，排练室里很是嘈杂。

sentences.en: The sketch should be a kind of rehearsal for the eventual painting.
sentences.cn: 草图应该是最终绘画的某种演练。

sentences.en: The symphony is in rehearsal now.
sentences.cn: 这支交响乐正在排练中.

sentences.en: This young lady stepped forward, so that Carrie saw where to go, and the rehearsal began.
sentences.cn: 这个年轻的姑娘向前迈了一步, 这样嘉莉知道该站到哪里, 排演就开始了.

sentences.en: You can sharpen your skills with rehearsal.
sentences.cn: 排练可以让技巧更加纯熟。

trans.tran_cn: 排练，排演，彩排，演习，复述，详述
trans.tran_en: a time when all the people in a play, concert etc practise before a public performance
